text: "Campaign" is a song recorded by American singer Ty Dolla Sign. It was released on July 11, 2016, as the first single from his ninth mixtape of the same name (2016). The song, produced by D.R.U.G.S., features vocals from American rapper Future. ==Music video== The song's music video, directed by Alex Bittan, was filmed in Los Angeles in September 2016. It premiered on November 7, 2016, via Ty Dolla Sign's official YouTube channel. ==Remix== The official remix version of the song by Charlie Heat was also included on the mixtape. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- | scope="row"| US Bubbling Under R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"| 3 |- |} ==Release history== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row"| Worldwide | July 11, 2016 | | Atlantic | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 singles Category:2016 songs Category:Ty Dolla Sign songs Category:Future (rapper) songs Category:Atlantic Records singles Category:Songs written by Ty Dolla Sign Category:Songs written by Future (rapper)
title: Campaign (song)
